narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Novant Health Medical Group LLC is a Pediatrics provider based in Charlotte, NC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $20.4M in Medicaid payments across 482K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $20.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
